AttributesDescription: Unlocks the Phantom Appearance of the corresponding Echo.

Skill.DescriptionEx: Transform into Hoartoise for 20s, dealing up to 283.20% Glacio DMG to surrounding enemies each second and gaining 5 stacks of "Hardening." Each stack of "Hardening" <color=#ffd12f>reduces incoming DMG</color> by 20.00% and increases Movement Speed by 15.00%. Lose a stack of "Hardening" when hit (up to one stack per second). Attacks during transformation increase nearby party members' ATK by 12.50% on hit (up to one stack per second), stackable for up to 8 times, lasting for 20s. Losing all stacks of "Hardening" will remove all the ATK boosts and end the transformation. Cooldown: 40s.
Skill.SimplyDescription: Transform into Hoartoise for {0}s, dealing up to {1} Glacio DMG to surrounding enemies each second and gaining 5 stacks of "Hardening." Each stack of "Hardening" <color=#ffd12f>reduces incoming DMG</color> by {2} and increases Movement Speed by {3}. Lose a stack of "Hardening" when hit (up to one stack per second). Attacks during transformation increase nearby party members' ATK by {4} on hit (up to one stack per second), stackable for up to {5} times, lasting for {6}s. Losing all stacks of "Hardening" will remove all the ATK boosts and end the transformation. Cooldown: {7}s.

Fetter.Name: Void Thunder
Fetter.EffectDefineDescription: A Sonata from a lost age that belongs to the uncrowned king. Some voices seem to be forgotten, but their awakening often requires but a short segment of a familiar melody.

Fetter.Name: Freezing Frost
Fetter.EffectDefineDescription: A seemingly calm but powerful Sonata that belongs to the powerful who can manipulate the thunder. Storms do not issue a warning, but no one can ignore their omen.

EffectDescriptions: Spectro DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Intro Skill.
DefineDescriptions: A Sonata for the returning Rover, its harmonious melody to guide and steady their battle rhythm on the journey.

EffectDescriptions: Glacio DMG + 10% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 3 times, each stack lasts 15s.
DefineDescriptions: A seemingly calm but powerful Sonata that belongs to the powerful who can manipulate the thunder. Storms do not issue a warning, but no one can ignore their omen.

A high-spirited and intense Sonata that belongs to the warriors who can conquer the battlefield. The burning flame is the beat of the march, the triumphant steps on the flame with burning convictions.
